name: R.A.S.
description:
Evade into the space with Jo. But be aware of all the problems that can happen in a Spaceship...Apparently no one else wants to take care of these problems, you'll have to activate the machines and switch the buttons on.

Be quick ! You wouldn't want your spaceship to explode !

Simple controls

Use WASD to move around.
Use the SPACE BAR to interact with your environment. (i.e. clicking on buttons, interacting with terminals...)
Use SHIFT to zoom out.

Goal
Survive as long as possible, once two terminal Blue Screen, the game is over.
It may seem simple, but the difficulty increases as you resolve problems.

This game was built during a 42 Hours Game Jam around the theme : Always More 

Most of the visual assets were created by LeRoiErrant during the Jam.
Sound assets are coming from the Internet and the Unity free assets.
